hiveArticle.title: Office Party be like - Drinks and Food
hiveArticle.body:
One of the perks of working in office is that every two weeks you will have some small party called as Happy Hours usually happens on Fridays. It have all the fun involved food, drinks, gossips and some fun activity.

![image](https://img.esteem.ws/8vl6bruvvp.jpg)

<hr>

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/0k0z7hmbdy.jpg)

<hr>

Camera : Nokia 6
